lead_paragraph: Markets were assessing the testimony of the Federal Reserve chairwoman, Janet L. Yellen, who was speaking before Congress.

headline.print_headline: Banks, Retailers and Fed Plans Lead Markets Higher
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Higher as Banks Rise on Trump Hopes

abstract: Stocks rise following announcement of Federal Reserve plans to raise interest rates.
